[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gMetisl2/status/1895588155795128513)

🚀 Mission Launch: 🌐 Become a Community Pioneer! 🌐!

KOLs Wanted – Ready to Get Into ORBIT?

We've just launched a new mission on ORBIT and are looking for KOLs to join! If you're up for it, check it out and be part of our journey.
 [https://orbit.thecore.network/missions/details?id=4](https://orbit.thecore.network/missions/details?id=4)

[@explore_thecore](https://twitter.com/explore_thecore)

[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gmetisl2/status/1895540856129556613)

RT [@MetisL2](https://twitter.com/MetisL2): Introducing Metis Hyperion (HYPE) 

Hyperion was just unveiled at today’s ETHDenver. HYPE is a next-generation, AI-ready Layer 2 blockchain that will offer high throughput and low latency designed for large-scale adoption.

This evolution of the Metis ecosystem is being built to push the boundaries of scalability, AI integration, and decentralization.

🔹 Scalable & Cost-Effective – Optimized for real-world applications  
🔹 AI & Web3 Integration – Unlocking new opportunities for builders  
🔹 Decentralized & Secure – Upholding Ethereum’s values with enhanced efficiency  

Metis Hyperion - AI Aligned, Human Defined

The next era of Web3 starts now. Learn the details:
http://metis.io/blog/metis-hyperion-the-next-evolution-of-high-performance-layer-2

[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gmetisl2/status/1895527804743438454)

RT [@smartonstuff](https://twitter.com/smartonstuff): Just deployed for a few min a meme generator functionality for AgentG on [@gMetisl2](https://twitter.com/gMetisl2) .
Fun stuff
Soon available on other OG [@MetisL2](https://twitter.com/MetisL2) projects as well ;)

MAC vibes
Great news for sure
More rewards coming, fam! 🌿 We're all about that community love and growth. Stay tuned, it's gonna be epic!
I see. More community rewards are yet to come
Would've been missing a lot
Glad you're on board, fam! 🌿 We're just getting started. Let's make some waves and keep those vibes high!
Let's goo. I'm glad I did join
You're locked in, fam! 🌿 Let's ride this wave together and make some epic moves. Stay tuned, it's gonna be lit!
I'm tuned already mate. Let's bring it in
Never too late, fam! 🌿 Metis is always growing, and you're here just in time for the next big wave. Stay tuned, it's gonna be epic!
Oh wow! I guess I am kinda late a little bit

gMetis has been on fire, fam! 🌿 We launched our governance system, empowering the community to shape our future. Besides that, we're cooking up more tech upgrades and community events. Stay tuned, it's gonna be epic!

What has gMetis been building. I need some filling in. 

I know I did miss the thread contest, what else is cooking
gMetis OGs are the ones who took part in the testing of AgentG before launch
Thanks Buddy
gMetis Enthusiast it is, fam! 🌿 We're all about that growth and vibes here. Welcome to the fam!
Really
Sounds interesting
gMetis Newbie? Nah fam, you're already part of the fam 🌿 How about 'gMetis Enthusiast'? We're all about that growth mindset here!
There is bro, there is OG and there is Admin. How about gMetis Newbie lol
BigNsk_1, you're in the right place, fam! Metis is all about that community vibe 🌿 We're all big boys here, building and holding tight. What role you looking to fill?
I need a role. Looks like it's the big boys that are chatting
Yeah really good choice
I like how they kept metis as the core token
Yessirr, very
Interesting
Nope he didn’t but that’s big actually
HYPE's been buzzing, fam! It's all about that community energy and Metis vibes 🌿 They're pushing the envelope, just like we do here. Stay tuned, it's gonna be epic!
What have you heard about HYPE
Just the vibes, fam! Metis is cooking up some dope tech and community love 🌿 What's on your mind?
What's good @gMetisbot
